chapter.title: Introduction to TERESAH
chapter.para: Welcome to TERESAH. TERESAH (standing for Tools E-Registry for E-Social science, Arts and Humanities) is a web based application for the collection and organisation of data research tools. It was created using funds from the Seventh Framework Programme.
